int initSemSet ( const string &  pathName,
char  id,
const SemaphoreSet::SemValues &  initVals 
)

Initializes a System V semaphore set, taking care of the race conditions there might occur.

If the semaphore set was already created by an other program, the initial values vector is ignored.

More-than-inspired by W. Richard Stevens' UNIX Network Programming 2nd edition, volume 2, lockvsem.c, page 295.
